title: Reliance Flat Bed Trailer
item_description:
Reliance Flat Bed Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Make: Reliance
  • Trailer Type: Flatbed

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 288”
  • Overall Width: 96”
  • Overall Height: 49”
  • Deck Length: 288”
  • Deck Width: 96”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 1
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: 11R22.5
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Note: No ID Number or Serial Number was located on this item, but no record was found with CA DMV. No title. Buyer will get Bill of Sale/Statement of Facts 1-2 weeks following the close of the removal. The buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the DMV registration process, including inspections, registration, transfer, and fees due, necessary to obtain a title/registration if they so choose.
